Terrorists staged multiple simultaneous attacks in Paris Friday night,...
...killing scores of people with automatic gunfire and explosions.
President Francois Hollande said he was declaring a state of emergency...
..and ordering France's borders closed, an unprecedented act in 21st century Europe.
From Washington, President Barack Obama said the United States was ready to help...
A large number of people were being held at a concert hall,...
...where a performance by an American band was interrupted by rapid-fire bursts...
Up to a thousand people were in the audience.
Many escaped, but it is not yet clear how many were taken hostage or executed.
